contest-event.event-date:
March 29, 1980 D Welsh Area Championship (Second Section)
Welsh Area Championship (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area Championship welsh-area-championship-second-section
None Wales
Second
Concert Overture for Brass Band
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Due to a dispute with the National organiser, in 1980 the Welsh area was run unofficially, without accreditation to the national contest. The 1979 Welsh section winners were invited to the 1980 finals. An account of events and the dispute is given at http://www.4barsrest.com/articles/2010/1102.asp?l=in#.Wh3ZQVVl-Uk.
March 22, 2011, 10:43 p.m. Nov. 28, 2017, 10:59 p.m.
1 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band E. Charlton
2 Coedely E. Coombs
3 Abergavenny Borough Band Eric Powell
4 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Don Hendy
Unknown Result City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band C. Randall
